summary: An ordinance relating to and providing for the improvement of 51st Avenue Northeast and 53rd Avenue Northeast, each from East 42nd Street and East 45th Street; and certain parts of certain other streets and avenues, by grading, and otherwise improving the same; all in accordance with Resolution No. 9119 of the City Council of the City of Seattle, creating a local improvement district therefor, and providing for that payment for said improvement to be made by special assessment upon property in said district payable by the mode of "Payment in Bonds".
